Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:



Vehement watched as the shields dropped, smiling to himself.  "So, the 
Maximals gave into my demands.  What pathetic creatures." he said as he 
powered up the boosteres in his feet, launching into the air passed his two 
minions, heading for Ulaanbaator at his top speed.

"Come, my comrades, our destiny has almost come!"

---

Sun Crusher swirled in the air, his boosters launching him off after Vehment.

---

Reflector smiled at the Archbishop's words, taking off after him and Sun 
Crusher.
